Save Notes: Fiendish Resilience: At the end of a rest, can gain resistance to a chosen damage type from anything other than magical or silver weapons
Magic
Spell Slots: K0: 4; K5: 2; S0: 2; S1: 1 Attack: K: 5; S: 5 Spell DC: K: 13; S: 13
Spells:
Bane (K1 [Thief Of Five Fates] Ench): R30' 3 targets suffer -1d4 on attacks and saving throws (save Charisma negates) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Chill Touch (K0 Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 2d8 HP necrotic and target cannot regain hit points for 1 rd; undead also suffer disadvantage vs. self attack for 1 rd
Dream (K5 Illu): Touched controls the dreams of a known target for 8 hr and can inflict 3d6 HP psychic (save Wisdom negates)
Eldritch Blast (K0 Evoc): R300' Ranged spell creates 2 rays that inflict 1d10 HP force each
Light (S0 Evoc): Touched object lights a 20' radius (save Dexterity negates) for 1 hr
Magic Missile (S1 Evoc): R120' 3 darts inflict 1d4+1 HP force each [+Level creates +1 dart]
Polymorph (K4 [Sculptor Of Flesh] Tran): R60' Transforms the target creature (save Wisdom negates; shapechangers automatically succeed) for concentration up to 1 hr or until reduced to 0 HP
Prestidigitation (K0 Tran): R10' Creates minor magic effects for 1 hr
Ray Of Frost (S0 Evoc): R60' Ranged spell inflicts 2d8 HP cold and -10' Speed for 1 rd
Scrying (K5 Divi): Self sees and hears a chosen target (save Wisdom, modified by degree of familiarity, negates for 24 hr) for concentration up to 10 min
True Strike (K0 Divi): R30' Self gains advantage on the next attack on the target within 1 rd
Magic Notes:
Eldritch Invocations: 5 selections
Eldritch Spear: Increases Eldritch Blast range to 300'
Magic Initiate (Sorcerer): Knows 2 sorcerer cantrips and can cast a chosen S1 spell once per long rest
Pact Magic: Can cast spells from the warlock spell list
Pact Of The Blade: Can use an action to conjure a magic weapon or use a 1 hr ritual to make a magic weapon summonable
Sculptor Of Flesh: Can use a Warlock spell slot to cast Polymorph once per long rest
Thief Of Five Fates: Can use a warlock spell slot to cast Bane once per long rest
